sentences.en: " You go get in the buggy.
A buggy ferries you down to the main restaurant to finish the evening with a dance on the beach.
sentences.cn: 一辆轻便马车将把你送到主餐厅，以沙滩上的一支舞结束这个晚上。

sentences.en: a child's buggy fitted with a sunshade
Amasai spent all the morning washing the buggy.
sentences.cn: 阿马萨花了整整一上午刷洗那辆轻便马车.

sentences.en: Cars are prohibited, so transportation is by electric cart or by horse and buggy.
sentences.cn: 汽车禁行，所以运输就靠电动车或马车。

sentences.en: Check if you can fold the buggy without having to remove the raincover.
sentences.cn: 看看你是否能不用拿掉防雨罩就把童车折叠起来。

sentences.en: I couldn't get the baby's buggy past the car parked on the pavement.
sentences.cn: 人行道上停了辆轿车,我没法把婴儿车推过去.

sentences.en: I got back in the buggy.
I grabbed the size of the buggy, ready to jump, even though I could not swim.
sentences.cn: 我一下子抓住了马车的车厢, 准备跳下来, 尽管自己不会游泳.

sentences.en: Johnnie Gallegher, come out to the buggy with me. "
sentences.cn: 动手吧,约翰尼- 加勒格尔,跟我到马车这里来一下.

sentences.en: Make sure that the child is strapped tightly into the buggy.
sentences.cn: 一定要把孩子牢牢地拴在婴儿车上.

sentences.en: She was huddled up in the buggy seat.
The buggy turned over and Nancy was thrown out.
sentences.cn: 童车翻倒了，南茜被甩了出来。

sentences.en: We drove in a buggy past the Dorset house.
sentences.cn: 我们驾了一辆单骑独座的小马车经过道塞特家的住宅.

sentences.en: When automobiles become popular, the use of the horse and buggy passed away.
sentences.cn: 汽车普及后, 就不再使用马和马车了.

trans.tran_cn: 多虫的, 臭虫成灾的, <俚>神经病的
婴儿车，童车，<俚>旧汽车，小机动车，轻便马车
trans.tran_en: a light carriage pulled by a horse
